coverageBase.description: A Coverage, representing a mapping from a domain to sets of data values described by parameters.

domainBase.description: A Domain, which defines a set of positions and their extent in one or more referencing systems

axes.description: Set of Axis objects, keyed by axis identifier

then.description: Grid domain: x and y are required, z and t optional
Trajectory domain: mandatory composite axis and optional z axis
Vertical Profile domain: mandatory x, y and z axis and optional t axis
Point domain: mandatory x and y axis, optional z and t axis
PointSeries domain: mandatory x, y and t axis, optional z axis
MultiPoint domain: mandatory composite axis, optional t axis
MultiPointSeries domain: mandatory composite and t axes
Section domain: mandatory composite and z axes
Polygon domain: mandatory composite axis, optional z and t axes
PolygonSeries domain: mandatory composite axis, optional z and t axes
MultiPolygon domain: mandatory composite axis, optional z and t axes
MultiPolygonSeries domain: mandatory composite axis, optional z and t axes

i18n.description: Object representing an internationalised string where keys are BCP 47 language tags.

ndArray.description: Object representing a multidimensional (>= 0D) array with named axes, encoded as a flat one-dimensional array in row-major order

numericSingleValueAxis.description: Axis defined by single numeric value

numericValuesAxis.description: Axis defined by list of numeric axis values and optional bounds

observedProperty.description: A definition of the quantity being measured.

parameter.description: Represents metadata about the values of the coverage

type.description: Type of the parameter object, must be "Parameter"

categoryEncoding.description: Maps IDs of categories in the observedProperty to range values

type.description: Type of the parameter group object, must be "ParameterGroup"

items.description: The inner array: the coordinates themselves

primitiveValuesAxis.description: Validates any axis with primitive values

referenceSystemConnection.description: Reference System Connection object: connects coordinates to reference systems

stringSingleValueAxis.description: Axis defined by single string value

stringValuesAxis.description: Simple axis with string values (e.g. time strings)

tiledNdArray.description: Object representing a multidimensional (>= 1D) array with named axes split up into sets of linked NdArray documents

items.description: A tuple of axis values (numbers or strings)

bounds.description: Optional axis bounds. Must be twice as long (and same data type) as "values"
